# Christopher N Maymon, PhD

**Experimental Psychologist | VR Developer | Data Analyst**

I am cognitive psychologist, experimental methodologist, teacher, and research consultant.

My specialty is designing **ecologically valid experiments** capable of yielding profound insights into complex psychological phenomena. My [research](publications.qmd) integrates emerging technologies‚Äîsuch as **virtual reality**, **mobile biosensors**, and **artificial intelligence**‚Äîto study important theoretically grounded questions about the nature of cognition, emotions, and consciousness.

An experimentalist at heart, I am perpetually on the hunt for important empirical hypotheses that can be demonstrating using a straightforward but thoughtfully designed experiment.

I provide end-to-end [consulting services](consulting.qmd) to labs, companies, and government agencies.
